Quickstrike:




Quickstrike showed no fear in Shredder's fit. All he did in reply to it was 
a deep chuckle. He crossed his mismatched arms and just glared at the other 
Predacon.

"Ya shoulda stuck by mah side, then ya wouldn't of been slagged. Musta 
fergot t' tell th' computer t' recogonize ya as one of us." He snickered, 
ducking his head.


>From: Yanshosh@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Mon, 29 May 2000 18:26:23 EDT
>
>::Shredder::
>
>Shredder's loses his temper when he hears Quickstrike chuckle.
>
>"I'll tell you where I was!" he yells, swinging his damaged fist at
>Quickstrike, "I WAS BEING SLAGGED BY THE AUTOGUNS YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO
>DISABLE!!!!!" He screams in a voice that could be heard outside the base.
